summary: An owl, two sparrows, a dove and a pair of would-be aviator mice join forces to fight against an evil bird of prey who threatens the peace in their lovely forest.
cast: Sofie Bredesen|Vigga Bro|Lisbet Dahl|Pernille Hansen|Anne Marie Helger|Lasse Jonsson|Tine Karrebæk|Tommy Kenter|Per Tønnes Nielsen|Per Pallesen|Claus Ryskjær|Helle Ryslinge|Ove Sprogøe|Kasper Fønns Stilling|Emil Tarding|Barbara Topsøe-Rothenborg
title: Fuglekrigen i Kanøfleskoven
